biotools.summary: PHENOtypic STAte MaP (PHENOSTAMP) is an algorithm that combines the Clustering Classification and sorting Tree(CCAST) algorithm (Anchang et al. 2014) with an optimal 2D visualization of projected single-cell data using a neural network. It is mapping lung cancer epithelial-mesenchymal transition states and trajectories with single-cell resolution.
